summary.blockquote: WARNINGBrowsers differ on which global context they expose this interface in (e.g., only window in some browsers and only dedicated worker in others), making them incompatible. Keep this in mind when comparing support.

remarks.para: The MediaStreamTrackProcessor interface of the Insertable Streams for MediaStreamTrack API consumes a video object's source and generates a stream of objects.

-
-Insertable streams for MediaStreamTrack on developer.chrome.com[!NOTE]
This article was written before the API was restricted to workers and video. Beware its use of the non-standard version of MediaStreamTrackProcessor which blocks on the main thread.

MediaStreamTrackProcessorMediaStreamTrac.summary: The MediaStreamTrackProcessor() constructor creates a new object which consumes a video object's source and generates a stream of s.

MediaStreamTrackProcessorReadable.summary: The readable property of the interface returns a of s.
